languages.text: "Однако пока стали в характере ему не занимать — Версериан стойко отстаивает позиции экипажа в спорах с господином Антаром. Я восхищаюсь требованиями Арбитес к порядку, этой волевой жесткостью, непримиримостью..." {n}В голосе Иокасты безошибочно угадывается восхищение.{/n} "Но достопочтимый сенешаль прав — может, блюстители и не обладают столь совершенной подготовкой, но наша сила в безоговорочной верности династии, и не господину проктору вмешиваться в наш многовековой уклад службы".

"But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

Я восхищаюсь требованиями Арбитес к порядку, этой волевой жесткостью, непримиримостью..." {n}В голосе Иокасты безошибочно угадывается восхищение.{/n} "Но достопочтимый сенешаль прав — может, блюстители и не обладают столь совершенной подготовкой, но наша сила в безоговорочной верности династии, и не господину проктору вмешиваться в наш многовековой уклад службы".

It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. languages.text: 「とはいえ、今のところ、彼の背骨の鋼鉄は相変わらず曲がることはありません。ウェルザリアンはマスター・アンサールとの争いで乗組員を断固として守り続けています。私はアービトレイターの強固たる秩序を追い求めるその執念、その不屈さに敬意を抱いています…」{n}ザウアーバックの声に賞賛の色は隠しようがない。{/n}「しかし尊敬する家令長の言う通りです。我々の執行官たちは高等裁定局ほど優れた訓練を受けているわけではないかもしれませんが、我々の力は王朝への絶対的な忠誠心にあります。何世紀にもわたって試され証明された慣習に、尊敬する代理人様とはいえ干渉すべきではありません」
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、今のところ、彼の背骨の鋼鉄は相変わらず曲がることはありません。ウェルザリアンはマスター・アンサールとの争いで乗組員を断固として守り続けています。私はアービトレイターの強固たる秩序を追い求めるその執念、その不屈さに敬意を抱いています…」{n}ザウアーバックの声に賞賛の色は隠しようがない。{/n}「しかし尊敬する家令長の言う通りです。我々の執行官たちは高等裁定局ほど優れた訓練を受けているわけではないかもしれませんが、我々の力は王朝への絶対的な忠誠心にあります。何世紀にもわたって試され証明された慣習に、尊敬する代理人様とはいえ干渉すべきではありません」

「とはいえ、今のところ、彼の背骨の鋼鉄は相変わらず曲がることはありません。ウェルザリアンはマスター・アンサールとの争いで乗組員を断固として守り続けています。私はアービトレイターの強固たる秩序を追い求めるその執念、その不屈さに敬意を抱いています…」{n}ザウアーバックの声に賞賛の色は隠しようがない。{/n}「しかし尊敬する家令長の言う通りです。我々の執行官たちは精巧に研ぎ澄まされた刃ではないかもしれませんが、我々の力は王朝への絶対的な忠誠心にあります。何世紀にもわたって試され証明された慣習に、尊敬する代理人様とはいえ干渉すべきではありません」

languages.text: "Aber für den Moment bleibt der Stahl in seinem Rückgrat so unbeugsam wie immer – Werserian hat die Crew bei Disputen mit Meister Anthar unerschütterlich verteidigt. Ich bewundere das hündische Bemühen des Arbitrators um Ordnung, seinen hartgesottenen Ernst, seine Unerbittlichkeit ..." {n}Die Bewunderung in Sauerbacks Stimme ist unverkennbar.{/n} "Aber der geschätzte Truchsess hat recht – unsere Enforcer sind nicht so erstklassig ausgebildet wie das Adeptus Arbites. Unsere Stärke liegt in der unverbrüchlichen Loyalität gegenüber der Dynastie. Es steht dem geschätzten Proktor nicht zu, sich in Jahrhunderte vielfach erprobter Praxis einzumischen."
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

traits.locale_text: "Aber für den Moment bleibt der Stahl in seinem Rückgrat so unbeugsam wie immer – Werserian hat die Crew bei Disputen mit Meister Anthar unerschütterlich verteidigt. Ich bewundere das hündische Bemühen des Arbitrators um Ordnung, seinen hartgesottenen Ernst, seine Unerbittlichkeit ..." {n}Die Bewunderung in Sauerbacks Stimme ist unverkennbar.{/n} "Aber der geschätzte Truchsess hat recht – unsere Enforcer sind nicht so erstklassig ausgebildet wie das Adeptus Arbites. Unsere Stärke liegt in der unverbrüchlichen Loyalität gegenüber der Dynastie. Es steht dem geschätzten Proktor nicht zu, sich in Jahrhunderte vielfach erprobter Praxis einzumischen."

languages.text: "Şimdilik dimdik duruşundan katiyen ödün vermiyor. Werserian, Üstat Anthar'la tartışmalarda mürettebatı kararlılıkla savunuyor. Yargıcı'nın inatçı düzen tutkusuna, tavizsiz sertliğine, amansızlığına hayranım..." {n}Sauerback'in sesindeki hayranlık apaçık hissediliyor.{/n} "Ne var ki muhterem Seneşal haklı. İnfazcılarımız Adeptus Arbites kadar iyi eğitimli olmasa da kudretimiz, hanedanlığa sorgusuz sadakatimizde yatar. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen, asırlardır süregelen bu uygulamaya karışmamalıdır."
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdilik dimdik duruşundan katiyen ödün vermiyor. Werserian, Üstat Anthar'la tartışmalarda mürettebatı kararlılıkla savunuyor. Yargıcı'nın inatçı düzen tutkusu, tavizsiz sertliği, amansızlığına hayranım..." {n}Sauerback'in sesindeki hayranlık apaçık hissedilir.{/n} "Ne var ki muhterem Seneşal haklı. İnfazcılarımız Adeptus Arbites kadar iyi eğitimli olmasa da kudretimiz, hanedanlığa sorgusuz sadakatimizde yatar. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen, asırlardır süregelen bu uygulamaya karışmamalıdır."

"Şimdilik dimdik duruşundan katiyen ödün vermiyor. Werserian, Üstat Anthar'la tartışmalarda mürettebatı kararlılıkla savunuyor. Yargıcı'nın inatçı düzen tutkusu, tavizsiz sertliği, amansızlığına hayranım..." {n}Sauerback'in sesindeki hayranlık apaçık hissedilir.{/n} "Ne var ki muhterem Seneşal haklı. İnfazcılarımız, ince bileylemeli kılıçlar gibi olmasa da kudretimiz, hanedanlığa sorgusuz sadakatimizde yatar. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen, asırlardır süregelen bu uygulamaya karışmamalıdır."

languages.text: «Por ahora, el acero de su espinazo es tan inflexible como de costumbre. Werserian ha defendido a la tripulación firmemente en sus disputas con el maestro Anthar. Admiro la incesante búsqueda del orden del Arbitrator, su severidad, su talante implacable...». {n}La admiración de la voz de Sauerback es inconfundible.{/n} «Pero el estimado Senescal tiene razón. Aunque nuestro personal de seguridad no haya recibido un entrenamiento tan excepcional como el del Adeptus Arbites, nuestra fuerza viene de una lealtad incuestionable hacia la dinastía. No le corresponde al estimado Procurador cuestionar siglos de prácticas de eficacia demostrada».
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

traits.locale_text: «Por ahora, el acero de su espinazo es tan inflexible como de costumbre. Werserian ha defendido a la tripulación firmemente en sus disputas con el maestro Anthar. Admiro la incesante búsqueda del orden del Arbitrator, su severidad, su talante implacable...». {n}La admiración de la voz de Sauerback es inconfundible.{/n} «Pero el estimado Senescal tiene razón. Aunque nuestro personal de seguridad no haya recibido un entrenamiento tan excepcional como el del Adeptus Arbites, nuestra fuerza viene de una lealtad incuestionable hacia la dinastía. No le corresponde al estimado Procurador cuestionar siglos de prácticas de eficacia demostrada».

languages.text: “但现在，他铁打的脊梁依然坚如磐石。与安萨大师的争论过程中，韦尔森始终坚定地站在船员这边。我钦佩安萨监察官对秩序的执着追求，钦佩他毫不妥协的严厉，也钦佩他残酷无情的作风……”{n}苏尔贝克声音中带着不容置疑的赞赏。{/n}“不过，尊敬的总领确实说得没错。尽管我们的执法者可能不像法务官那样接受过极其严格的训练，但我们的力量，在于我们对王朝的绝对忠诚。这些行事手段经过了长达几个世纪的考验，尊敬的监察官无权进行干涉。”
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

traits.locale_text: “但现在，他铁打的脊梁依然坚如磐石。与安萨大师的争论过程中，韦尔森始终坚定地站在船员这边。我钦佩安萨监察官对秩序的执着追求，钦佩他毫不妥协的严厉，也钦佩他残酷无情的作风……”{n}苏尔贝克声音中带着不容置疑的赞赏。{/n}“不过，尊敬的总领确实说得没错。尽管我们的执法者可能不像法务官那样接受过极其严格的训练，但我们的力量，在于我们对王朝的绝对忠诚。这些行事手段经过了长达几个世纪的考验，尊敬的监察官无权进行干涉。”

“但现在，他铁打的脊梁依然坚如磐石。与安萨大师的争论过程中，韦尔森始终坚定地站在船员这边。我钦佩安萨监察官对秩序的执着追求，钦佩他毫不妥协的严厉，也钦佩他残酷无情的作风……”{n}苏尔贝克声音中带着不容置疑的赞赏。{/n}“不过，尊敬的总领确实说得没错。尽管我们的执法者可能不像法务官那样锋芒毕露，但我们的力量在于我们对王朝的绝对忠诚。这些行事手段经过了长达几个世纪的考验，尊敬的监察官无权进行干涉。”

languages.text: « Mais pour le moment, il reste plus inflexible que jamais. Werserian défend bec et ongles son équipage lors des désaccords avec maître Anthar. J'admire la détermination de l'arbitrator pour faire régner l'ordre, sa sévérité et son implacabilité... {n}déclare Sauerback d'un ton vibrant d'admiration.{/n} Mais l'honorable sénéchal a raison : nos prévôts ne sont peut-être pas des combattants d'exception comme ceux de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais notre force réside dans notre loyauté sans faille à la dynastie. Il est inutile que l'honorable proctor interfère avec des pratiques centenaires qui ont su faire leurs preuves. »
languages.original_text: "But for now the steel in his spine remains unbending as ever — Werserian has been staunchly defending the crew in disputes with Master Anthar. I admire the Arbitrator's dogged pursuit of order, his hard-nosed severity, his implacability..." {n}The admiration in Sauerback's voice is unmistakable.{/n} "But the esteemed Seneschal is right — while our enforcers may not be as superbly trained as the Adeptus Arbites, our strength lies in our unquestioning loyalty to the dynasty. It is not for the esteemed Proctor to interfere with centuries of tried and tested practice."

J'admire la détermination de l'arbitrator pour faire régner l'ordre, sa sévérité et son implacabilité... {n}déclare Sauerback d'un ton vibrant d'admiration.{/n} Mais l'honorable sénéchal a raison : nos prévôts ne sont peut-être pas des combattants d'exception comme ceux de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais notre force réside dans notre loyauté sans faille à la dynastie. Il est inutile que l'honorable proctor interfère avec des pratiques centenaires qui ont su faire leurs preuves. »
